channel.title: Wow.. Halo Reach is
channel.description:
.................................................................................. AMAZING!
Like for real you need to go buy it.
One of the best games I've played in a long while.
Discuss if you have/or don't have.

Halo Reach is just amazing tbh[/quote]

How is it amazing? Was so fucking disappointed. Believe they were suppose to make 32 v 32 game play. Which never happened.

item.title: Wow.. Halo Reach is
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

rip4d:

Does anybody else find Forge World to be a little too big?

Thats the point. But I find it harder to forge on this game rather halo 3. But ah well.

ziplock:

The game is in fact amazing. I was really surprised at the strange structure of the game. It’s like it was made by completely different people, the maps are really odd too, there not Bungie style maps, there more crowded and harder to maneuver but I like that factor a lot. Makes the game more difficult. Halo 3 was pretty much the easiest game in the world because it was just aim and shoot. This game adds a lot more strategy to it.

Exactly, its not really the halo aspect of the game. Its more of a strategy game now,

Read full topic

item.title: Wow.. Halo Reach is
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Halo: Combat Evolved (frequently referred to as simply Halo or Halo 1) is a first-person shooter video game developed by Bungie. The first game of the Halo series, it was released on November 15, 2001 as a launch title for the Xbox gaming system, and is considered the platform's "killer app". With more than five million copies sold worldwide as of November 9, 2005, Microsoft released versions of the game for Microsoft Windows (ported by Gearbox Software) and Mac OS X in 2003, and the surrounding storyline was adapted and elaborated into a series of novels and comic books. The game was later released as an Xbox Original for download onto an Xbox 360 HDD.

There.
And wtf, came out on Mac before PC

Read full topic

item.title: Wow.. Halo Reach is
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:24, topic:360263”][quote author=Lin link=topic=456694.msg3342505#msg3342505 date=1284506664]

Ok, so I’m in town tomorrow, I gots a debit card with 80 quid on it… already spent over 200 last week, I have no job so this is a lot k, shall I get it?

p.s. any chance it’ll come out on pc? I’m more of a pc gamer…
[/quote]Don’t bet your luck on it for a long time… Halo PC came out some time, and Halo 2 PC didn’t come out until Halo 3 (IIRC), so you’re looking at a while before it does (And if anything, Halo 3 PC will have to come out).

Halo came out on computer before it came out on any console (did it even come out on any console?), I remember playing a leaked beta at a LAN party in high school.[/quote]What are you smoking? Halo Combat Evolved came out for the XBOX in 2001 and was released for the computer in 2003 o.O

Read full topic

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:35, topic:360263”][quote author=JaydenD12 link=topic=456694.msg3342825#msg3342825 date=1284531263]

So… I just got the game. It sucked, so I put it in the toilet and peed on it.

I would lol but you just wasted $150

Please tell me that game didn’t cost anywhere near $150 dollars? Even half that would be a rip for any game.

I got it for $98.00
[/quote]

Why are you guys paying so much? It’s $52-$60 here: http://www.amazon.com/Halo-Reach-Xbox-360/dp/B002BSA20M I’d imagine it would be the same at a local store.[/quote]

They probably bought the big packages that give you a bunch of gay stuff like a poster, or some toy that can brake easily.

Also @OP I can post in a halo topic saying it sucks and saying black ops is better because I have the right to.

item.title: Wow.. Halo Reach is
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Tribbinator, post:21, topic:360263”]Halo 1 > all halo

When they put time into quality of gameplay and not quality of graphics, it turned out so much better in my opinion…Discus.[/quote]

They did both. And welcome to black ops, the gameplay will be shit, graphics will be good.

Chassy13:

Never was a big fan of the Halo games and the only one I was willing to spend money on for split-screen was Halo 3: ODST.

Why? That was the worst of them all. But Firefight was fun, which is why the Halo is amazing.

Firefight > Forge > Campaign > Multiplayer

item.title: Wow.. Halo Reach is
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Sorry, wrong game twas $119.99 CoD black ops is going to be $154.99 at EB Games

[quote=“Acrodox, post:30, topic:360263”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=456694.msg3342473#msg3342473 date=1284505827]
No Halo is a gay game, just buy black ops.
[/quote]

No, this one is going to be made by activision, which was made by cod 5, world at war, which sucked hairy balls. Therefore the only ownage call of duties are 4 and 6, which are made by who? Oh yes, infinity ward. this next one will blow, only get the call of duites made by infinity ward, fuck activision.[/quote]
Your facts are invalid (not quite right). Call of Duty World at War was developed by Treyarch and PUBLISHED by Activision. Even though Treyarch is the developer, Activision are still the rightful owners of the call of duty game.
